Administration.text:
Type:
Antifungal
Dosage Forms: 2% Cream
Routes of Administration: Topical
Common Trade Names: Monistat-Derm, Desenex, Lotrimin, Micatin, Zeasorb

Candidiasis,_cutaneous.text: Apply 2% Cream BID to affected area x2 weeks

Tinea_corporis.text: Apply 2% Cream BID to affected area x4 weeks

Tinea_cruris.text: Apply 2% Cream BID to affected area x2 weeks

Tinea_pedis.text: Apply 2% Cream BID to affected area x4 weeks

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: Unknown
Metabolism: None, minimal systemic absorption
Excretion: None

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Inhibits 14-alpha demethylase, reducing fungal cell membrane ergosterol synthesis
